description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. This game is as simple as just flipping all the panels to face up. Can you pass all the stages and add the girls' illustrations to the gallery? With the upgrade version, after beating all the stages including the SPECIAL, you can move the breasts of the images for the HARD level in the GALLERY.
